request.description:
## 

	`"page": "Tutor Panel - Add Schedule",
        "method": "POST",
        "authentication": "bearer",
        "api_url": "BASE_URL + 'tutor/job/add-schedule'",
        "body": {
            "job_tutor_id": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "162359",
                "description": "Given in tutor panel - view job api"
            },
            "day": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "Saturday",
                "enum_values": [
                    "Saturday",
                    "Sunday",
                    "Monday",
                    "Tuesday",
                    "Wednesday",
                    "Thursday",
                    "Friday"
                ],
                "description": "Day for specific schedule"
            },
            "weekday": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "Saturday",
                "enum_values": [
                    "0",
                    "1",
                    "2",
                    "3",
                    "4",
                    "5",
                    "6"
                ],
                "description": "Weekday for specific schedule"
            },
            "from_time": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "17:30:00",
                "description": "Start Time"
            },
            "to_time": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "19:30:00",
                "description": "End Time"
            }
        },
        "response_sample": {
            "status": 201,
            "message": "New Schedule Created",
            "data": null
        }
	`

##

	`"page": "Tutor Panel - Update Schedule",
        "method": "PUT",
        "authentication": "bearer",
        "api_url": "BASE_URL + 'tutor/job/update-schedule'",
        "body": {
            "job_tutor_id": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "162359",
                "description": "Given in tutor panel - view job api"
            },
            "schedule_id": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "123",
                "description": "Given in tutor panel - Schedules api"
            },
            "day": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "Saturday",
                "enum_values": [
                    "Saturday",
                    "Sunday",
                    "Monday",
                    "Tuesday",
                    "Wednesday",
                    "Thursday",
                    "Friday"
                ],
                "description": "Day for specific schedule"
            },
            "weekday": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "Saturday",
                "enum_values": [
                    "0",
                    "1",
                    "2",
                    "3",
                    "4",
                    "5",
                    "6"
                ],
                "description": "Weekday for specific schedule"
            },
            "from_time": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "17:30:00",
                "description": "Start Time"
            },
            "to_time": {
                "type": "String",
                "required": true,
                "example": "19:30:00",
                "description": "End Time"
            }
        },
        "response_sample": {
            "status": 202,
            "message": "Schedule Updated",
            "data": null
        }
	`
